const [pages, setPages] = useState([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]); const increaseHandler = () => { let arr = [] for (let i in pages) { console.log(arr) arr.push(parseInt(pages[i]) + 1) } console.log(arr) setPages(arr) } const decreaseHandler = () => { let arr = [] for (let i in pages) { console.log(arr) arr.push(parseInt(pages[i]) - 1) } console.log(arr) setPages(arr) } const Pagination = ({clickHandler,page}) => { return (
  • -
  • clickHandler(pages[0])}>{pages[0]}
  • clickHandler(pages[1])}>{pages[1]}
